comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps Arthur Deerin Call, head of the American Peace Society in 1912, as reported in the NYT on August 1, 1912 -- query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=950DE6DC1630E233A... His middle name is provided in select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA0916F83F59177A...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.swarthmore.edu/library/peace/Exhibits/aps.and.trueblo... has a picture of Arthur Deerin Call. Looks like the same guy to me.
